TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SynthesizerState extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Enumera os valores para o estado do .

remarks.format:
## Remarks O <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.State%2A> usos de propriedade <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SynthesizerState> para indicar o estado atual do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>. Para ver um exemplo, consulte <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.State%2A>.
O <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.PreviousState%2A> e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.State%2A> propriedades use <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SynthesizerState> para indicar o estado do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> quando o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged> é gerado.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Speech.Synthesis.SynthesizerState Paused = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Indica que o está em pausa.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Speech.Synthesis.SynthesizerState Ready = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Indica que o está pronto para gerar fala a partir de um prompt.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Speech.Synthesis.SynthesizerState Speaking = int32(1)
